0620c2974797cb9d.voiceContent: Hmm, that means I'm friends with a hero, doesn't it

0c9397b16918f84c.voiceContent: There's no better feeling than jumping into a hot spring when you're done with work for the day

1133699cd6c771c5.voiceContent: Well, I guess I can't get you the stars, or the moon. But pretty much anything else

158d3dae83fee03f.voiceContent: If you need anything, just tell me. If it can be found in Inazuma, I can get it for you

1d89f6a99000a9f7.voiceContent: You don't want to see anyone suffer

275a62e79679f214.voiceContent: But the more I learn, the more curious I become — what makes you so special

2a3cd0ec5f4169bb.voiceContent: I want to know more about youuuu

2aa23b8626dc6f6a.voiceContent: Ah, right. You've got such a large piece of paradise here. Do you have any plans for it, you know, besides just living here

2bea8ef943df8676.voiceContent: I like fireworks because creating incredible fireworks makes me feel so proud of my work

33cb9eb5d2f5fcb4.voiceContent: And you don't want your reunion to be a disappointing one, do you

34709b13f8ba1a5d.voiceContent: Wow, I'm really impressed. Honestly, I envy you

3ba600cba9b32c2b.voiceContent: Wha—? There might have been a slight misunderstanding, you see, my family's business is not the usual kind of business

3bbb9f30b49f51b5.voiceContent: #Hey, it's you, {NICKNAME}! How are you doing

3d2945b3a0dec7ac.voiceContent: Something like, Are you blind? I can't squeeze into that!

3e40dbf582ee1d0f.voiceContent: Like, Let me send over 'Tarou the Goldfish,' the most trusty fish in my aquarium, to accompany you!

3e9c1ef3955a2596.voiceContent: My pops and I, we mainly do business so that we won't let everyone down

4195af4d8a93a2b4.voiceContent: You can invite all of your friends to see the fireworks. Consider it a gift from me to you

4752cd9e29ab4f07.voiceContent: With toys everywhere! They'd be flashing, moving, and spinning. Also, tasty snacks for whenever I'm hungry

47890fb3026ad597.voiceContent: Come on, come with me! After all the effort you've put into this place, we should have some fun here

487bb9afd42b9a21.voiceContent: Anyway, when it's finished, let me know. I'll set off some fireworks to celebrate

489a211146acb313.voiceContent: Hehe, sorry, I'm getting too excited

4c18fbc4afcffcb1.voiceContent: Yes! This is the kind of atmosphere I live for, I absolutely love it

51595fb033932ee0.voiceContent: Who would have thought that a little push from you, and poof — we're in here

520841a29415777a.voiceContent: If she couldn't get in, there would be no chance for me

52deafc698b60838.voiceContent: Wow, good idea! That sounds really interesting. I want to help

5378d18b83238803.voiceContent: But... I'm happy to hear you say that

54b50303d8f4e8c4.voiceContent: Starting from Mondstadt, to Liyue, and then to Inazuma... I will go see the sights you've seen and meet the people you've come across

5894d98d19cfaeed.voiceContent: Sure, you know I love to talk. Let me think, is there anything interesting going on these days..

62d56d773ac663b3.voiceContent: This is an adeptus relic from Liyue, right? It's incredible. I thought you were joking when you asked me to get into this pot

67bddbb58bed0956.voiceContent: Thanks to the family business, I've got tons of connections. Haha

7aedfed85ff757c2.voiceContent: I want to know more about youuuu

7b77b1a88ab56c1d.voiceContent: Do you wanna join me? Relaxing in a hot spring, chatting away, ahh, it's one of the greatest feelings

7ef90e0d9a89b4c8.voiceContent: I'm sure it'll be able to get in. It's a goldfish after all

819570efc50d2bdf.voiceContent: There is always a reason for everything. For example, I like to talk because when I was a kid, Pops really seemed to enjoy listening to me

8ae8af54331a4574.voiceContent: Living in a world like that would be a dream come true

923072e45ed8c3b4.voiceContent: I know merchants in Liyue are really good at making Mora, they're experts at landing deals both big and small

973ca8a025fb57cc.voiceContent: I'll support you with all I've got, so go ahead and write the rest of your story

986694b1d07d55ee.voiceContent: You are like a storybook hero, so awesome

9adde9440ed44905.voiceContent: *sigh* Maybe I can open a second Naganohara here

a05dbf8f4fac979c.voiceContent: Pretty good! I'm surprised how awesome your place is

a4e35ef49f906b72.voiceContent: Sorry, I don't mean to put any pressure on you. I was just, well... how should I put it? Simply, I..

a4edaba0fd11bebe.voiceContent: Of course I like it. I could easily live here forever

a77d739915161543.voiceContent: Haha, Paimon told me that she had the same reaction when she first saw the pot

ac296d7de34eb973.voiceContent: Ever thought about building a parlor or a show room? Or maybe a training ground

b89e41274d4f7e52.voiceContent: If you want to pass the time, you can't go wrong hanging out with me

c3adef198758f30a.voiceContent: But I've decided, I want to retrace your path

c5cbadbb45caaa8e.voiceContent: I'm super impressed, it's pretty amazing that you managed to do this place up like a shopping street. Is there a Naganohara Fireworks here, too? I wanna go find it

c773b6d0906a6760.voiceContent: I hope you dream about my fireworks

ca1c6d2e8482ccae.voiceContent: I'll help you. No matter where it is, you must be reunited

cba54599514f9b63.voiceContent: Wow, is that an open-air hot spring I see? Amazing~

d5601ce08eb9eee5.voiceContent: I've heard people everywhere tell tales of your heroics, and I've seen it first-hand adventuring with you

d6a93cfb95c41255.voiceContent: That's what one has to do if they want to get to know someone completely

dd412c9d1dd0652b.voiceContent: And you don't want your reunion to be a disappointing one, do you

dde83b7f7b70f0aa.voiceContent: I had no idea what to say, I didn't know if I should object or just follow along..

e430e94ab75aebc5.voiceContent: No, no. No need to seriously consider it. It's just a little fantasy of mine

eb78acdae3196a05.voiceContent: However, our family's customers are mostly regulars, so we put most of our focus on those relationships

ee40aba7a598617e.voiceContent: Me?... Hehe, I'd build a playground

f427107b9300544a.voiceContent: What a nice day! Let's go have some fun

fa98cd977e3fd147.voiceContent: A wide open view, fresh air... It's such a nice place

24e5ad50a5810078.voiceContent: (Avin almost caught up to me. She sure is something.

9f3415361cf865fe.voiceContent: Whoa, there are so many huge mushrooms here. They're big enough to lie on

d6f3a13f0a665482.voiceContent: (I have to calm her down first.

f03f7842fc74fd45.voiceContent: (What to do first... Hmm, maybe I'll see what they're selling around here.

f846372ca10b5387.voiceContent: Oh, so it's for jumping? Watch this

018ccb8909e82dda.voiceContent: The loveliest fireworks go along with the most wondrous moments. Tiny little emotions that can easily slip away are captured within these fireworks and passed down in a different form. The notes we give our clients are like a key that awaits those who wish to open a gate to commemorate the past. We at Naganohara are the keepers of that gate

081c14a2472144b3.voiceContent: I don't worry about loose lips sinking ships. The emotions contained in the words people say don't lie. Misunderstandings that arise from saying things wrongly can be resolved if you just talk more, but if you say nothing, the other person won't understand what you mean, and they can't get closer to you

10b8753a83d88f2c.voiceContent: Fireworks are probably the furthest thing from the eternity that the Shogun pursues. She probably feels that their transient glory has no practical purpose in Inazuma. *sigh* It's probably something that one who has eternity in their grasp will find hard to comprehend. It is precisely because we mortals are like fleeting shadows that we need to treasure such flickers of beauty

11615d2da4acf86e.voiceContent: Question time! So, what should you do after watching fireworks all day? Hehe, the answer is... to watch them again in your dreams, of course! Good night. See you tomorrow

182028e1ad3165a8.voiceContent: If there's one thing I'm confident in, it's my gaming skills

1ee0debc1d9ebd91.voiceContent: Argh, that didn't count. Best of three

1f6689b2b737c5d1.voiceContent: Every moment of the summer festival is a moving tale. Those who meet under the light of fireworks grow up, mature, and grow old. When they set off the same fireworks as they did in the beginning, the skies reflect that same image from years ago... Fireworks are not eternal, but I believe that the wonderful emotions behind them should walk alongside Inazuma into eternity

28e5de668b9202b2.voiceContent: Never fear, Yoimiya is here! Evil begone! Justice prevails!Think this is a good way to introduce the powers you've taught me to the children? Isn't it cool? Hehe! Hey, tell me if anyone picks on you, too. I'll stick up for you

2baeadf95d7a3626.voiceContent: Ooh! Will we find any firework materials in here

378c25cbc6fcd6d0.voiceContent: See ya! I'm still not done playing yet... I just got some interesting cards, so I wanna check them out

43bc824480e3901b.voiceContent: If we've got nothing else to do, why don't I tell you a story

4a259c903bc4c389.voiceContent: With all these combat skills I've learned from you, I should just become an adventurer on the side — apart from my day job making fireworks... Or... should I just become a hero instead

5236ec12d85c5481.voiceContent: When the last sparks of the fireworks have disappeared into the sky, they turn into rain and snow, and will fall upon the earth again, nourishing the land and nurturing humanity, so that someday they can be sent up into the sky again and display their magnificence. Of the many stories my father told me, this one is my favorite

533b5cfef473e5cf.voiceContent: Let's have a game of rock paper scissors! On my count, now — rock, paper, scissors! Woohoo, I won! I won! ... Hmm? I didn't change my choice halfway. Why would I ever do that

53ba4304a22d2764.voiceContent: Fireworks! Wait, that doesn't count? Well then, let me think. Um... This one's a toughie. I like to chat with the neighbors, I like going to summer festivals with the children, swimming, picking wild fruits... Oh, I can't decide which I like most... Wait, I've got it! I love playing with everyone

599bf9aabef25305.voiceContent: Beidou's been helping me ship my fireworks out ever since Inazuma was locked down. I prepared a huge boat-shaped firework just to surprise her — and when the Crux Fleet was about to leave, this firework went whoosh! Right in front of their eyes, straight into the sky. The sailors got such a huge fright — they thought one of their ships had somehow flown off! But Beidou liked that trick very much, saying that it was exactly what a pleasant surprise should be — very pleasant, and a surprise

5b9ed07f2c18a90f.voiceContent: The higher they fly, the louder the explosion

68058bfee227f2cc.voiceContent: Ah... *yawns* Good morning. The morning air is the freshest. Come on, take a few extra breaths — it'll make you smarter

6c40bfac4981ab1a.voiceContent: Arataki's gang? Huh!? So he isn't just someone with too much free time on his hands

727572ace71dc8f7.voiceContent: Sure. Let's get this party started

73d51178d83df783.voiceContent: I'm not giving you an inch

74fefd8a82bff5bd.voiceContent: Ah, I shoulda paid more attention..

7c26b540aa7e5a8d.voiceContent: Let me let you in on a little secret. When I first received my Vision, I used it as a flint to light fireworks and boil water, before returning home, chucking it into a storeroom, and forgetting all about it. In the end, it was my father who found it and told me that it was a precious item that I should keep safe. Haha, at least it didn't get taken back by our dear Archon

82f84c998523daa4.voiceContent: Wow, you've got a real knack for making tasty treats! You should totally set up a stall at a festival some time, oh it'd be a hit for sure

87304c7c397bc808.voiceContent: Ah, this is great! I feel so relaxed all over, I could almost float away

8c79520796471479.voiceContent: Haha, watch me make a snowball... pew

8f0e8a5f69ba3598.voiceContent: We cooperate a lot due to work. Unlike people in the other two Commissions, she always lets me finish speaking and answers me seriously without showing any impatience. I'd say that the word ladylike was practically made just for her

8fba7c8ba1c71b86.voiceContent: Now's the best time to test our fireworks out, though I'm sure they'll look good whether they explode in the sky or on the ground... Hehe, just kidding. I'll pay attention to safety

95250cf358650663.voiceContent: Huh!? Oh, I need to focus..

9c57029743b440c8.voiceContent: Hehehe, let me give this shooting fireworks straight into the skies with a bow business a shot

9cd370af05cf6160.voiceContent: The wind's so strong—! It's blowing my voice back at me—! Hahaha..

9d2384c460fea010.voiceContent: Aw, don't be sad. How about another round

9da92fbafa97a850.voiceContent: I shan't tell the final tale, I think. Instead, let's watch the fireworks together in silence. You can record the beautiful scenery and all the things you wanna say down. Not that this is the end, of course. On the contrary, I believe that our story is only just beginning

a6880709fccda0bb.voiceContent: I prefer snacks to entrees. I always go from stall to stall during festivals, eating as I go. By the way, are you any good at making snacks? I'll trade the dango I made with you. Here, have the big ones

a72bb3c6ec447165.voiceContent: The novel that I've been reading for a while finally reached its end. But the heroine lost her memory, and the planned wedding fell through... That's so... sad..

ad6e57ac9f1d9725.voiceContent: The courier from Komaniya Express? She's super reliable and really quick on her feet! Ingredients used in coloring the fireworks always run out quickly, but she always delivers a new batch right when I need them! I gave her a firework once as a thank-you gift, but she was too scared to light it, saying that she got spooked once by the sound of fireworks. Hehe, so I told her to find a nice viewing spot far away and set it off for her

ada1e7f543404c98.voiceContent: While squatting next to some children and watching them catch goldfish during one summer festival, I suddenly had a thought could I make fireworks that could go off on the surface of the water? Thus, the Goldfish Fireworks were born! They can swim here and there, emit multi-colored lights, and they can even spit bubbles! I never thought that it would actually work, but I guess wonders never cease

af257d8201cb4a23.voiceContent: Our family has a long tradition in which we will give every client who orders customized fireworks a note. Its contents can only be understood by our family, and it records the specific formula of the fireworks that were ordered. Whether ten years or a hundred years pass, our family can make exactly the same fireworks as they did in the past so long as the client brings us that note

b140472092cf2246.voiceContent: Welcome to Naganohara! My name is Yoimiya — just let me know if you need anything! We have Kushikatsu, Egg Roll... Wait, no, we're not a restaurant. We make fireworks! Like these, see? Sparkling, crackling, little fireworks

b149f8bc3f283168.voiceContent: Time for lunch! ... Oh my, it's an egg with a double yolk. What wonderful luck

b3022df8866b5b41.voiceContent: Birthdays are never occasions for yourself alone. Those who send you cakes, light candles, applaud, and cheer... They are all truly thankful that you were born into this world. That's why it must be a lively occasion, so that everyone can get their chance to thank you! Well then — happy birthday! Are you ready? I'm about to ignite the fireworks

b33b09115c86479e.voiceContent: It actually doesn't matter what I do. What matters are the people I work with. When I'm with you, even simple things like watching the scenery or kicking a small jar about make me happy. Talking to you never gets old, after all

b38a3a3097720f2f.voiceContent: Let me know if you see her, alright? I'd really love to take her to one of the festivals and introduce her to lots of new friends. She always looks a little down, but if she meets some people she can hang out with, maybe she'll slowly pick herself up again

b6d69a0cf041a8f7.voiceContent: Are you going to hold a festival

be1957dc903b18d3.voiceContent: Who knew Genius Invokation TCG was so popular... We should set up a booth for the next festival

c1c9104cc415bad2.voiceContent: Have you ever kept goldfish as pets? They're very cute

c2f2345e6e9664a4.voiceContent: Fireworks are for now, but friends are forever

c5b1153dbbb4f63e.voiceContent: Good food really perks you up, and puts you in the mood to share some stories. Ooh, actually I got a good one, you've gotta hear this one...

c93c67ebeace5086.voiceContent: Ahh, the fireworks are going to get soaked! Let's find shelter, quick! Oh, we're not going to make it

c9abddb47aca991d.voiceContent: Oh, he may look scary, but he is very popular with the children. However, he can be very competitive. Every time we play with the children, it always turns into a showdown between him and me. For example, we'd drink a bowl of ramen soup in one go, or try to eat sour plums without making any faces. The children will cheer us both on and try to guess the winner. And when that happens... well, then I can't let him beat me, right

ca044987479fb7ca.voiceContent: Urgh, it feels like there's a Specter swirling around in my stomach... That can't be ideal

d11e90eab19729db.voiceContent: *Blubbering noises* Hah! I'm copying the sound that Paimon makes while disappearing

d6135f0b702e634c.voiceContent: Hehe, lemme take that off your hands

dde16cacad4b7ae3.voiceContent: People with no worries like myself speak plainly, while those with many cares often speak of ancient poetry or the scenery. They talk of flowers and birds, wind and moon, but never about the reality that confronts them. He's got quite the tale to tell, I'm sure

e1875725304a5a6a.voiceContent: He's quite the talker and has reasons behind every word that he says. Sometimes, it might seem like there's no connection, but as he goes on, everything will eventually dovetail nicely towards a single purpose. It's... quite different from how I do things. I ask him for help whenever I encounter a matter I can't settle

e48e7cac2f252a9e.voiceContent: Oh, the shame, the shame! Hehe..

e5b7b0bdd9a5f040.voiceContent: Hehe, time to show you what I've been working on

e78c5afa6081e91a.voiceContent: Grr... You're too good at this..

ea81f23630f69b97.voiceContent: Due to public safety and fire hazard-related concerns, I often get whisked off to the Tenryou Commission's place for a lecture. Kujou Sara's probably the most reasonable of the bunch. At least she'll hear me out before passing any judgment. If I'm in the right, she'll acknowledge my perspective, and if I'm wrong... Hehe, then I'll get Thoma to come and help me apologize to her

eb56b287233a3888.voiceContent: Wait, you said there was a kid in Mondstadt who was good at making bombs?... Now, they aren't much different from fireworks. In other words, she might be a genius... Ohh, I'd love to meet her. *sigh* But isn't it dangerous to let children play with explosives? Don't the people of Mondstadt worry about that

ecaccf9a16afcb0c.voiceContent: You wanna hear a story? Alright, alright. Sit here, and I shall tell you the story I'm most proud of — the story of the Naganohara family! You'll rarely ever hear me talk about something this serious, you know

ed38afb941b71390.voiceContent: Ayaka once asked me during a ritual at the shrine if I could prepare some fireworks for the Lady Guuji's leisure. I thought to myself, isn't the Lady Guuji supposed to sit inside the shrine throughout the ritual? So I watched her the whole time during the ritual, wondering how she'd like to release fireworks. I waited, and I waited, and then Ayaka came over at length to tell me that the Lady Guuji was most pleased. I mean, what? She'd already released the fireworks? Was the person sitting inside the shrine not her, then

efcc261dc2b743d4.voiceContent: Aww, just one more round! I think I figured out what the trick is

f2102ef3373a0425.voiceContent: Ugh... Milk never fails to start some real fireworks in my stomach — crackle, kaboom! Y'know what I mean? But I can handle dishes and snacks made with milk for some reason, hmm. Maybe the little Seelie in my stomach is just pickier than most

f494de0aa6e43fde.voiceContent: Did you know? A lot of the fireworks used during Liyue's Lantern Rite were purchased from our shop. I made them to order before asking Beidou to ship them to Liyue. Exports like these aren't allowed under the Sakoku Decree, but... How can there be festivals without fireworks

f7b636dcb4188b91.voiceContent: My father's hearing isn't very good. When I was young, he would always smile no matter what I said to him, and so I thought that everything I said was correct. So I kept talking, and he would keep smiling. Later, I found out that he was smiling because he couldn't hear clearly, but... as long as he's truly happy, I'll keep talking to him

f925121c5449e080.voiceContent: Did you ever try to step on a spot of light before as a child? You know, those patches on the ground created when the sunlight passes through the leaves. I once thought that it would disappear if I stepped on it, but it would always jump onto my foot instead. I tried and tried and tried, but I never succeeded... Quite the sore loser I was, then — sitting on a rock, sighing to myself and thinking, Ah, so there are things in this world that can't be stepped on...

f9999844de208f1f.voiceContent: We once discussed matters concerning the summer festival deep into the night. We were both really tired, and I invited her to go take a bath. But when she heard that it involved many people bathing in the same pool, she went red in an instant! That was when I first learned that noble ladies can't use public baths
